thread.title: I have never had such a big room (real appartment) in Paris for such a small price
thread.title_full: I have never had such a big room (real appartment) in Paris for such a small price - Review of Appart Hotel Cosy Cadet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KG-2016-05
title: I have never had such a big room (real appartment) in Paris for such a small price
text:
That was the biggest surprise during my several trips to Paris. For a small price that I normally pay for very small rooms in Paris' hotels, I got a big appartment with a big room and bed, big corridor with fully furnished kitchen. separate lavabo and separate bathroom.
The only problem was that I could not find the place, even walking three times just beside the proper address. There is a big metal door, with no real sign of the hotel. So you have to guess and push that door - then you can discover the proper entrance in the courtyard.
